name: RenderStatusUpdateTemplate
description:
Renders a status update template with given incident data.

Use this tool to render a status update template by providing the incident ID and a status update message. This helps in generating formatted updates based on specific incident details.

parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.description: The ID of the incident resource to render the template for.

parameters.name: status_update_data
parameters.description: Provide the JSON object with the incident ID and status update message for rendering the template.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
